VIII.i.2.B.3.e
.
Evaluations Previously Assigned for Pension Purposes
Evaluations assigned for pension purposes are binding, as described in
38 CFR 3.104
, on subsequent decisions to award SC compensation for the same disability.Â  If granting SC retroactively under the
Nehmer
stipulation, do not grant a lower evaluation based
on the same evidence
used to assign the pension evaluation.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Eligibility to Retroactive Payment Under the Nehmer Stipulation
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
